page_content:
New Reports - Graph Report

Version:MissionOS_2.0

A new Web Report is configured by first clicking Report Creation > Batched Reports, then navigating to the New Reports tab. (the web reports created here are different from the web reports generated from the Homepage Instrument Data interface).

 

 

 

 

The Report Type drop-down contains 3 items listed as Report Types:

  • Individual Report
  • Summary Report
  • Graph Report

Method 1:

To create a new graph report, perform the following steps:

Select the option Graph Report from the Report Type drop-down field.

In the Title field, type the desired title for the Report.

Select from the Instruments section, any one of the following options:

  • All Instruments of the following
  • Selected Instruments
  1. If you select All Instruments of the following, new fields appear as drop-downs. Select from the drop-downs as required:
  • Object Class Type
  • Object Classes
  • Type
  • Subtype
  • Project
  • Contract
  • Site
  • Zone

 

Select from the Date Range options as given below:

    • Last 1 day
    • Last 3 days
    • Last 1 week
    • Last 2 weeks
    • Last 1 month
    • Last 3 months
    • Or select days from-to manually.
    • Recent readings
    • Specific dates (if you select this option, place the cursor in the field below to select the required dates)

 

 

Select the checkbox Exclude instruments without data if required.

Choose Graph Template, based on preference.

From the Choose Report Template section, opt for the required attributes for the report to display on generation:

Select from the Graph Listing options:

  • Instrument wise
  • Template wise

Enter the number of reports per page, you want. (Maximum 6)

Select the Paper Size and Orientation (any combination):

  • A3, A4
  • Landscape, Portrait

Note:

Report template populates from that created under Tables tab in Object Definition interface. For more information on creating Tables template, refer to the manual Table Template Creation (Normal Instruments) .

 

Finally, click Save Report.
The Report gets saved and listed under the Reports’ Library tab, and New Binder tab.

 

 

To view the report, go to the Reports’ Library

Type the title of the report in the Search field, then click Search. Or scroll down to see the newly created Report.

Click the Web Report button to view the report in another browser tab.

 

Note:

  • Click Edit to edit the report.
  • Click Delete to delete the report.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Method 2:

To create a new graph report, perform the following steps:

  1. Select the option Graph Report from the Report Type drop-down field.
  2. In the Title field, type the title for the Report.
  3. In the Instruments section, choose Selected Instruments option, then select from the following drop-down fields that appear:
  • Object Class Type
  • Object Classes
  • Type
  • Subtype
  • Project
  • Contract
  • Site
  • Zone
  1. Click Search to search for the instruments belonging to the above filter criteria.

 

 

 

 

  1. The instruments get listed in the Instruments List
  2. Select the listed instrument with the cursor and click the Add selected instruments or Add All Instruments.
  3. This results in instruments getting added to the Selected Instruments

 

 

 

Note:

The remaining steps in creating a graph report are the same as that explained under Method 1.

  1. Select from the Date Range options. (Refer to Method 1)
  2. Select the checkbox Exclude instruments without data if required.
  3. Choose Graph Template, based on preference.
  4. Choose Report Template and the corresponding attributes. (Refer to Method 1)
  5. Finally, click Save Report.
    The Report gets saved and listed under the Reports’ Library tab, and New Binder
  6. To view the report, go to the Reports’ Library
  7. Type the title of the report in the Search field, then click Search.
  8. Click Web Report against the listed report. The report opens in a new tab of the browser.

 

 

 

In the New Binder tab, you can select the now listed report and attach it to a new binder.

The Binder Report once created is listed under the Binders’ Library tab. Click the arrow on the new Binder to see the attached report. You can further add reports as desired using the Add Reports button.

You can send the Binder Report as email (Send E-mail button) or schedule as required.
